articles.author: Sam Marsden
articles.title: Barcelona's Champions League exit, their first knockout round miss in 17 seasons, proves how far they've fallen - ESPN
articles.description: For the first time since 2003-04, Barcelona aren't in the knockout rounds of Europe's top competition, no surprise for a team yet to hit bottom.
articles.content: Barcelona will play in the Europa League in the new year. The very same Barcelona that wanted to -- and still want to -- form a European Super League earlier this year are no longer good enough to ma… [+6366 chars]

articles.title: Scholz takes over as German chancellor, ending Merkel era - Reuters
articles.description: Social Democrat Olaf Scholz became Germany's chancellor on Wednesday, ending 16 years of conservative rule under Angela Merkel and launching his three-way coalition that has pledged to boost green investment and strengthen European integration.
articles.content: BERLIN, Dec 8 (Reuters) - Social Democrat Olaf Scholz became Germany's chancellor on Wednesday, ending 16 years of conservative rule under Angela Merkel and launching his three-way coalition that has… [+4555 chars]

articles.title: Russian invasion of Ukraine could be on scale 'not seen in Europe since WWII', UK armed forces head warns - Sky News

articles.author: FRANCESCO GUARASCIO, Reuters
articles.title: EU expects Europe plants to produce 3.6 billion COVID shots in 2022 - GMA News Online
articles.description: Vaccine plants in the European Union are expected to produce 3.6 billion COVID-19 shots next year, out of a global output of more than 20 billion, two senior EU officials said on Wednesday.
